Package com.example.cymarket.Reporting

Class ReportsAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ReportsAdapter.ReportViewHolder>
com.example.cymarket.Reporting.ReportsAdapter
public class ReportsAdapter extends androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<ReportsAdapter.ReportViewHolder>
Adapter for displaying a list of Report objects in a RecyclerView.

Handles binding each report's title, description, and date to the corresponding views.

Author:
Tyler Mestery
